website_summaries.verdict: This is the kind of metal dustpan you will be handing down to the kids.
pros: Made without rivets as one piece of molded steel
Metal lays flat on surfaces to help sweep cleanly
Large size can be used for indoor or outdoor work
Does not tend to bend or break with heavy home use
cons: It comes with a huge sticker that covers the entire front of the pan and is difficult to get off

customer_reviews.title: Metal and Flat = Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I prefer metal because it’s simple to clean. It lays flat and even on cleaning surfaces. My ONLY gripe with this product was the sticker that was attached upon arrival. I’ve come to learn that heat is the most effective to get sticky stickers off with the least amount of mess. I ran hot water on the side that the sticker was not on to heat up the sticker side without getting it wet, and the sticker peeled right off without leaving any residue. Aside from that, this product serves its purpose exactly the way I needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Not made in US
customer_reviews.text: Made in China- at this price, I felt mislead that this was a US made product.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Bends easy.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it cause it doesn't stay flat on the floor to pick up stuff. The dirt just goes right under it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Great dustpan
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and used it yesterday. Great except for the sticker that covers the entire front. Tried to peel it off - forget it! I think they used super glue on it. But I got out my bottle of Goo-gone and poured it over and let it soak in. After about an hour, sticker came off with a little swearing and elbow grease. I works GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Anne J

customer_reviews.title: NOT MADE IN USA AS ADVERTISED!!😡
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, well made. It advertised as being made in USA, one of the main reasons I bought it. It is made in China. Very disappointed in Fuller Brush company for false advertising and for sending American jobs overseas. I will not be purchasing any Fuller products in the future. There are similar products that advertise made in China for half the price. Shame on you Fuller Brush company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great quality
customer_reviews.text: No it’s not lightweight but it gets the job done and no fear of breaking it. Really appreciate my metal dustpan. Even if you have an old broom, it will make cleaning up that much easier. Pan edge works better than some rubber ones I’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn Kent

customer_reviews.title: “The Perfect Gift for a Special Person”
customer_reviews.text: This dustpan reminds me of the metal ones used many years ago and is larger than most dustpans sold today. The metal edge is straight and eliminates any spillage of dirt. Although it seems expensive, the construction is solid and it should last a lifetime. It’s a good buy. I plan to buy two more for my daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Marge Miller

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This dustpan is spot on. Well made, heavy duty. Exactly what I was looking for at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieMae99

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much it will not bent like the plastic ones do so you can get all of the dirt in the pan
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Jones Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Cant get the product description off the dustpan
customer_reviews.text: The product works fine, but the product advertisement is permanently glued to the metal and I cant remove the paper. Just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene H.

customer_reviews.title: Never buy a plastic dustpan again!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on construction sites. Makes the job of cleanup easier and is sturdy enough to handle the cleanup of wood nails, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STURDY METAL DUSTPAN.
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest dustpan I have seen in ages. It is really sturdy since it is made of metal.
customer_reviews.author: MAHC

customer_reviews.title: metal rather than plastic
customer_reviews.text: I like the dustpan but could not easily get the 4" x 8" label off. Had to soak the pan in order to remove glue.
customer_reviews.author: Cjpj

customer_reviews.title: Packaging/Labels
customer_reviews.text: The sticker issue is a real pita! The manufacturer should listen up an resolve this irritating issue. They are most likely losing sales due to this - I would not buy it just because of all the negative reviews and comments!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

product_meta.title: Fuller Brush 12-Inch Metal Dustpan - Wide Sweep & Heavy Duty Steel Dust Pan w/Easy Grip Handle & Hook Hanger for Easy Storage - Mini Dusting & Handheld Cleaning Tool
product_meta.description: There is no mess too big or too small for this Fuller Brush 12” Metal Dustpan! Constructed of one-piece of heavy-duty steel the Fuller Brush Dustpan – it can withstand rigorous daily use as it does not bend nor break. The heavy-weighted dustpan stays put in its spot as you sweep – making it easy to collect all that dust and debris into its wide 12” open end. It also offers a dependable solution for a clean sweep – as the even edge of the opening prevents dust and dirt from escaping your sweep. Having a long and easy-to-grip handle makes it ideal for indoor and outdoor use – and has a handy hang-up hole on the handle for easy storage. The baked-on enamel finish makes it tougher and adds an attractive shine. Make your simple household sweeping task – easier and more enjoyable. Try this long-lasting 12” Metal Dustpan today – you surely last you quite a while.
feature_bullets: DIRT & DEBRIS COLLECTOR: It’s finally time to have a dustpan that will last. The classic, heavy-duty Fuller Brush 12-Inch Metal Dustpan can withstand rigorous daily use both inside and outdoors without bending and breaking.

DURABLE BUILD: Constructed for heavy-duty use with one piece of strong steel, this Metal Dustpan will see you through all of your sweeping jobs. Additionally, it has a baked-on enamel finish for increased durability as well as an attractive shine.

CLEAN SWEEP: This steel dust pan has an easy, dependable solution for a clean sweep. It’s specially designed with an even edge at the opening to prevent dust and dirt from escaping as you sweep and collect debris.

EFFICIENT CLEANING: Equipped with a long, easy-to-grip handle and a 12" W x 8" L collection area, you can comfortably hold the dustpan as you gather up large messes. When done, you can conveniently store it away with its handy hanging hole.

TRUSTED BRAND: Since 1906, Fuller Brush has provided high-quality, American-Made products that are designed to work and built to last. Whether you're looking for cleaning tips or the specific cleaning products to do the job, Fuller Brush has you covered!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars43 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
